content: work up this simple hoodie to keep your weebee toasty and warm in the winter months simply use the yarn weight and hook that you chose to make your doll & this cosy hoodie will fit perfectly you can find the free doll patterns & other clothing options for them here 1 in my ravelry store weebee is named after my youngest niece phoebe - when she was first born my daughter and phoebe s older sister couldn t say her name properly yet and she has been nicknamed weebee ever since weebee has a fabulously big head shaped feet hands with thumbs and a lovely round tummy and bottom - i m sure you ll fall in love with weebee as much as i have every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free but i have very little time to spare i have a three year old and tend to write these patterns at 5am lol so if you find any errors whatsoever in this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me and i will amend as soon as possible please be sure to join the weebee appreciation society facebook group 2 and share your weebee projects with everyone 1 http //www ravelry com/designers/laura-tegg 2 https //www facebook com/groups/1590618731240406/permalink/1591760137792932/ comment_id=1591766121125667&notif_t=group_comment_reply&notif_id=1472622242382140
